tool_description: Custom deal feed for Walmart online, providing daily updates for coupons, discounts, and special price breaks along with the necessary information, images, tags, and links directly to the products.
title: Walmart Deals Coupons

api_list.name: Get Walmart Deals
api_list.description: Endpoint to get daily Walmart deals
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://walmart-deals-coupons.p.rapidapi.com/walmart/deals"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "walmart-deals-coupons.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search Walmart deals
api_list.description: Endpoint to search in Walmart deals by keywords
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://walmart-deals-coupons.p.rapidapi.com/walmart/products_keyword"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "walmart-deals-coupons.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://walmart-deals-coupons.p.rapidapi.com/walmart/products_keyword"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "walmart-deals-coupons.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
